Uses of Package
org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi

  • Packages that use org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.ogm.options.generic

  • Classes in org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi used by org.hibernate.ogm.options.generic 
    Class and Description
    Option
    A configuration option describing a generic or datastore-specific setting, which applies globally, for a given entity type or for a given entity property.
    UniqueOption
    Specialized class to be extended by options that may be defined only once in the context of a given OptionsContainer.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi used by org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.context 
    Class and Description
    EntityOptions
    Entity-level mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
    GlobalOptions
    Global mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
    PropertyOptions
    Property-level mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi used by org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.impl 
    Class and Description
    EntityOptions
    Entity-level mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
    GlobalOptions
    Global mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
    Option
    A configuration option describing a generic or datastore-specific setting, which applies globally, for a given entity type or for a given entity property.
    OptionsContainer
    Container for a group of options.
    OptionsService
    Access point to OGM specific metadata information.
    OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext
    Contain a group of options separated in different scopes
    PropertyOptions
    Property-level mapping options common to all NoSQL stores.
  • Classes in org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi used by org.hibernate.ogm.options.spi 
    Class and Description
    Option
    A configuration option describing a generic or datastore-specific setting, which applies globally, for a given entity type or for a given entity property.
    OptionsContainer
    Container for a group of options.
    OptionsService.OptionsServiceContext
    Contain a group of options separated in different scopes

    Convert an Annotation into an Option.
